segments.text: I see the woman in her apron, carefully drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed, it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flowing out of the sink like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is grabbing cookies, looking thrilled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are tilting; it's precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is eager, palm open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, sunlight hits the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a peaceful view compared to this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the kids if they fall into that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full; they're probably excited about their haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the danger makes me worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
